name: Prison Escape Games: Break
description:
Play jail escaping missions to escape. Get ready to break maximum security prison in this newest game. Hard time is over in the rehabilitation center it’s time for parole from prisoner life. Show brutal attacking skills to the knockdown police officer and make the way out with your jail inmates.

Rival business tycoon conspired to keep you locked up in the criminal rehabilitation center. He bribed jail warden who sentenced you with illegal notorious criminals for fake crime extreme case. Escape from maximum security jail with your fellow cellmates. Discover weak spots in lockup for escaping prison life. Bribe security guard to run from the escape-proof facility. Use fist or baseball bat to smash security camera feed. Watch out for laser motion doors of the control tower. Shoot cops to get the key to escaping the prison. Escaping maximum security won’t be hard as much as getting back in jail. Takedown police officer and badly with tools or arms.

Prison mission is not over yet! Shoot police officers! It’s time to get revenge from reinforcement for punishment and torture. Get your inmates out of jail & free bandits from inescapable prison in this amazing RPG style simulation game. The escape mission has begun, help bad guys and thugs prisoners with mastermind plan. Use stealth and sneak melee attack to kill corrupt cops. Criminal transport for life sentence and punishment get most wanted killers out to revenge your rival tycoon. Watch out for laser camera, sniper guards & motion sensor laser doors. Lock doors and attempt to flee your cell inmates in this crazy prison escaping game.

Game Features:
Challenging missions in two modes: Jail Escape Mode & Survival Mode
Weapons include time bomb, baseball bat, Electric stun gun and rifle
Smooth controls for sneak and stealth walk or shooting enemies
Advanced security with laser camera surveillance
Realistic inside jail environment with cops and criminals
High quality 3D graphics and thrilling sounds


Download Prison Escape 3D simulator game for epic jail adventures. Give us your feedback in the reviews section and help us improve our games.
